arts.ttl: Cagliari Vs Inter Milan – Family Affair As Nerazzurri Rising Star Faces Brother In Sardinia
arts.sum: As Inter Milan prepare to face Cagliari on Saturday, Nerazzurri starlet Francesco Pio Esposito will go head-to-head with his brother Sebastiano for the first time in Serie A. As has been detailed by the Gazzetta dello Sport, the two have never faced one another as opposition. arts.ttl: Lazio Vs Milan The Standout Coppa Italia Fixture As Round Of 16 Draw Sees The Big Guns Enter The Competition
arts.sum: The Coppa Italia fixtures for the Round of 16 have been determined following the conclusion of Thursday’s action. Genoa beat Empoli 3-1 thanks to goals from Morten Frendup, Alessandro Marcandalli and Jeff Ekhator at the Luigi Ferraris. Torino also booked the spot after a narrow 1-0 victory over 10-man Pisa. arts.ttl: Cagliari Vs Inter Milan – Nerazzurri Pursue Consistency As Coach Chases New Record
arts.sum: Inter Milan head coach Cristian Chivu can win three consecutive games for the first time as Nerazzurri boss with victory over Cagliari on Saturday. Chivu’s side travel to Sardinia to take on the Rossoblu after successive wins against Ajax and Sassuolo. arts.ttl: Cagliari vs Inter Milan – Goalkeeper Rotation Underway As Swiss Veteran Shares Minutes With Spanish Star
arts.sum: Inter Milan head coach Cristian Chivu is fully prepared to continue rotating his goalkeepers, with reports from Italy claiming the Romanian will select Josep Martinez ahead of Yann Sommer for Saturday’s trip to Cagliari. This comes as per today’s edition of the Gazzetta dello Sport, via FCInterNews. arts.ttl: Cagliari vs Inter Milan – Nerazzurri Set For Key Attacking Boost With Argentine Star Back In XI
arts.sum: Inter Milan have received a boost ahead of this weekend’s Serie A game against Cagliari – with captain Lautaro Martinez and summer signing Petar Sucic expected in the starting eleven.
